message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,900,000. I know it's valuable to both of us, and I believe this price reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more reasonable agreement. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $1,500,000.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer was more in line with the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,750,000. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $1,600,000. I hope this aligns better with our interests.
